body.name: TMA Spray Mop T31, Wet Mop for Floor Cleaning, Microfiber Mop with 2 Washable Microfiber Pads, Floor Mop for Home or Commercial Use for Hardwood, Laminate, and Tile Floors - Gray and Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 35 mins
features: ✨【Upgraded Spray Mop, Better Cleaning Effect】TMA spray mop is made of sturdy aluminum alloy mop rods, which overcomes the common phenomenon of loose push rods of similar products. The entire production process using automated equipment testing eliminates the risk of water leakage, special pump nozzle design ensures uniform mist diffusion and effectively prevents nozzle clogging.

✨【Easy to Install and Use】Hardwood floor mop adopts a modular design and can be quickly installed by simply plugging and unplugging the mop handle, mop rod, and mop head. Mop with sprayer can spray cleaning liquid evenly on the ground by pulling the handle, avoiding frequent soaking of the mop and achieving efficient cleaning. The spray mop with washable pad features a convenient snap-on closure that allows quick replacement of cleaning pads to meet different cleaning needs and save time.

✨【Multi-Purpose Cleaning Tool】The Wet Mop for Floor Cleaning is designed with every floor in mind and can work on a variety of floor types, whether it's hardwood, tile, concrete, or laminate. And that spray mop with the reusable washable pads can easily handle both wet and dry mopping, providing you with a more flexible cleaning experience. Its application scenarios are not limited to the home, but can also easily meet the challenges in commercial environments.

✨【Flexibility and Maneuverability】The 360-degree rotating mop head allows the spray mops to rotate freely in all directions, especially in narrow or complex spaces. Spray mop for hardwood floors can more easily reach difficult-to-clean areas under the floor, such as the bottom of furniture, narrow gaps, etc., ensuring that cleaning covers corners and edges without leaving any dead spots, improving the comprehensiveness and thoroughness of cleaning.

✨【Economical and Practical】 TMA reusable mop is simple and practical. It comes with 2 reusable and washable mop pads. It supports both dry mopping and wet mopping, perfectly meeting household cleaning needs. The floor cleaner mop's economical design avoids unnecessary extra costs, allowing you to worry more and save money.

✨【Attentive Guarantee and Service】You can enjoy a one-year warranty when you purchase a TMA spray mop. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. The brand customer service team will reply to you as soon as possible within 24 hours. The package contains 1 mop, 1 scraper, and 2 washable pads. We are committed to providing you with high-quality products and complete after-sales protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mop, but I think the price has to be a typo!
reviews.reviewText: This spray mop is very nice. It's made out of lightweight metal and assembly is easy. The head is on a joint that allows you to push it (sideways) flat under furniture, and it makes quick work of cleaning my hardwood floors with any cleaning solution of my choice or just plain water. The fabric mop sticks on like velcro and stays secure, and tosses in the washer and dryer. I had mop envy; my mother has a spray mop similar to this one so I ordered this one when I saw it, and compared to hers, the mop head is the same shape and roughly the same size - this one is a smidge larger in length and width, but it's interchangeable with those you can find at chain stores. The bottle that holds liquid, however, is a lot smaller. It's adequate for mopping a small to medium sized home without needing a refill, and it does not leak, but the big brand mops have larger capacity. That being said, I have to believe the price is a typo! It is the same price they sell a whole vacuum cleaner for - the price would be fine for a vacuum but it's about 4 times what it should be for this little spray mop! If this were priced competitively with others on Amazon or at chain stores, I'd give it 5 stars. I do not think the value is there if the price being asked is correct.
